definition: pickpocket
surname San
three/3
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: What has three hands but only one face?
sentences.chinese: 什麼東西有三隻手，卻只有一張臉？

sentences.english: The thelloef was caught stealing and was sent to the police.
sentences.chinese: 三隻手被逮住偷工具，並且被送到差人那。

sentences.english: I suppose you don't know what a prig is.
sentences.chinese: 我看你不知道什麼是三隻手吧？

sentences.english: When he opens these arms, he is like a giant octopus.
sentences.chinese: 三隻手張開來，就像大章魚。

sentences.english: Tommy's father has three arms. They are big and strong.
sentences.chinese: 湯米的爸爸有三隻手，又粗又強壯。

sentences.english: The thelloef is peeping through a keyhole.
sentences.chinese: 那個三隻手從鑰匙孔中窺視。

sentences.english: The man in black on the bus is a pickpocket.
sentences.chinese: 車上穿黑衣服的男人是個三隻手。

definition: to judge between right and wrong/to reason things out
blocking the way
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. seeing others go hunting, one is excited by memories of the thrill of the hunt (idiom)/fig. seeing others do what one loves to do, one is inspired to try it again
to whisper to one another's ear
to use softness to conquer strength (idiom)
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
to advertise/to solicit business
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to upbraid
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
attributive (modifier)
protective coloration/camouflage
